sysevent_script_action.name: Proccess New Request

sys_update_version.name: sysevent_script_action_5b96d69c1bd2b19036211138b04bcbc9
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="c702587f1b18b91056266204b24bcba1" table="sysevent_script_action"><sysevent_script_action action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><condition_script/><description/><event_name>x_324813_ebonding.inbound.request</event_name><name>Proccess New Request</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[   var payload = JSON.parse(current.payload);

   var scTaskGr = new GlideRecord('sc_task');
   scTaskGr.addQuery('request', payload.request_id);
   scTaskGr.setLimit(1);
   scTaskGr.query();
   if (scTaskGr.next()) {
       payload.correlation_id = scTaskGr.getValue('number');
       current.payload = JSON.stringify(payload);
       current.update();

       var impUser = new GlideImpersonate();
       impUser.impersonate('d5a439fc1bcafd1036211138b04bcb60');

       new TransactionHandler().proccessInboundTransaction(current);
   }]]></script><synchronous>false</synchronous><sys_class_name>sysevent_script_action</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>luke.turner@cgi.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-10-31 10:14:19</sys_created_on><sys_domain>c702587f1b18b91056266204b24bcba1</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>5b96d69c1bd2b19036211138b04bcbc9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Proccess New Request</sys_name><sys_overrides display_value="">031b16801bde319036211138b04bcbc6</sys_overrides><sys_package display_value="ebonding" source="x_324813_ebonding">cd8aacd993b1b510327d718efaba10db</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ebonding">cd8aacd993b1b510327d718efaba10db</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysevent_script_action_5b96d69c1bd2b19036211138b04bcbc9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>luke.turner@cgi.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-10-31 10:14:19</sys_updated_on></sysevent_script_action></record_update>
